steps.title: Review: Database Relationships
steps.description: Revisit one-to-many and many-to-many concepts with visual diagrams
steps.content_guidance: Use ER diagrams to show relationship types. Start with simple one-to-many examples before introducing join tables.

steps.title: Understanding has_many :through
steps.description: Step-by-step guide to has_many :through with real-world examples
steps.content_guidance: Use a doctor-appointment-patient example. Show the migration, model, and query examples side by side.

steps.title: Practice: Build Associations
steps.description: Hands-on exercise building a tagging system with has_many :through
steps.content_guidance: Guide student through creating Post, Tag, and Tagging models with full CRUD.

steps.title: Polymorphic Associations Workshop
steps.content_guidance: Build a commenting system that works across multiple models using polymorphic associations.

rationale: Starting from basic relationship concepts builds confidence before tackling the specific gap areas of has_many :through and polymorphic associations.
